explanation: [0-0] The video is a split screen. The upper half shows a man and a woman on a rural path. The man, wearing a blue short-sleeved shirt and black trousers, is holding a stick. In front of him is a red devil head. Next to him squats a woman in a blue dress, holding a mobile phone in her right hand and reaching for a nearby green plant with her left hand. Beside her is a long-haired man's head. In the background are some houses and trees. The lower half shows Jesus and the devil arm-wrestling.

[0-6] Then the man puts the stick under the woman, and it turns out to be a shovel. The woman stands up, and the man swings his body up and down, stepping on the shovel. "BOOM" appears on the screen. Then the man touches his hip, and the woman squats down beside him.
